001package net.tvburger.jdl.model.training.regularization;
002
003import net.tvburger.jdl.common.numbers.Array;
004
005/**
006 * Explicit regularization involves modifying the objective (loss) function directly by adding a penalty or changing the targets.
007 *
008 * @param <N> Number type
009 */
010@Regularization.Mechanism(Regularization.Mechanism.Type.PENALTY_BASED)
011public interface ExplicitRegularization<N extends Number> extends Regularization<N> {
012
013    N lossPenalty(Array<N> parameters);
014
015    N gradientAdjustment(N parameter);
016
017}
